page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT ROUND CROFT.
page.content: Most people who live in the area work in one of the neighbouring towns of Northallerton, Darlington or Richmond, although some people travel much further afield to Tees-side,Newcastle or Leeds. Except for farm work, there is little employment for people in the villages. There is a small dairy in Dalton on Tees and a building in the village is used as a joiner's shop. In Croft there are two small electrical businesses employing about nine people each. Also in Croft there are two jobbing builders and a landscape gardener. The old school has been converted into an estate agents and a surgeon lives in the old rectory, where some of his patients visit him. The largest employers in the villages are St.Cuthbert's Hospital,Croft Spa Hotel and the two schools.
